nodes.text: M-2VB was a medical droid used by the Galactic Republic during the Galactic War. In 3639 BBY he was stationed on Carrick Station, where he examined Republic General Conlath, who suffered a mental trauma during an encounter with Dread Masters forces on Belsavis.
M-2VB was added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic in Update 1.5. M-2VB, Conlath and their quest were later removed from the game in Update 4.0, but brought back in Update 5.9.
